description:
A concentrated all-purpose cleaner to keep the hard surfaces in your life sparkling. It’s made with natural fir needle essentials oils, spruce essential oils and plant-based surfactants, and without any synthetic dyes, fragrances or preservatives. Use it to wipe down plastic coolers, mop floors, clean dishes, do laundry – the list of handy chores it can tackle just goes on.

  • Biodegradable
  • Vegan
  • Concentrated; use a couple of tablespoons for an average load of laundry
  • Equally effective in hard or soft water, and rinses freely hot or cold
name: Dr. Bronner's Sal Suds Cleaner 946ml
